# SwitchPilot
> Intelligent automation tool for live streaming (OBS/vMix) that monitors screen regions, detects scene changes using computer vision (Histogram + NCC + LBP), and executes automatic actions.

## Core Files
- [main.py]: Application entry point
- [switchpilot/core/main_controller.py]: Central logic controller
- [switchpilot/core/monitor_thread.py]: Computer vision & monitoring loop
- [switchpilot/ui/main_window.py]: Main GUI implementation
- [switchpilot/integrations/]: External control modules (OBS, vMix)
- [docs/developer/]: Technical documentation

## Key Concepts
- **Reference Image**: A saved screenshot of a game/camera scene.
- **ROI (Region of Interest)**: Specific screen area to monitor.
- **Detection Algorithm**: Ensemble method using Histogram Correlation (40%), Normalized Cross-Correlation (20%), and Local Binary Patterns (40%).
- **Actions**: Commands sent to OBS (WebSocket) or vMix (HTTP API) triggers upon detection.

## Architecture
- **Language**: Python 3.10+
- **GUI Framework**: PyQt5
- **CV Library**: OpenCV, NumPy
- **Build System**: PyInstaller (Spec file included)
